segments.text: And by beat song about AZ Coolform LLC
A family-owned company in Phoenix, Arizona
To save energy and keep homes comfortable year-round
Mention that they have been around for over a decade

improved_metadata.title: AZ Coolform Jingle
improved_metadata.description: A short jingle promoting AZ Coolform LLC, a family-owned foam insulation company in Phoenix, Arizona. The song emphasizes energy savings and home comfort.
improved_metadata.key_lyrics: And by beat song about AZ Coolform LLC
